name: The Falling Plane
description:
The plane is falling !

Use the left and right arrow of the key board to survive

You have to survive as long as possible, dodge the rocks, take speed boosts and collect coins to improve your score !

If your score increases, so does the difficulty !

Go as far as possible, discover more and more difficult paths which are randomly generated.
Buy efficient and more controllable planes that will make you a better player !
